document.full_text: international business machines said on thursday it expects africa to be a strong growth area for the information technology business over the next five years, thanks to growth in banking and telecoms.
document.title: ibm sees strong growth in africa for it sector
lines_and_colors: international business machines said on thursday it expects africa to be a strong growth area for the information technology business over the next five years, thanks to growth in banking and telecoms.
